overview:
Vericard is a unique and innovative product, digital employment verification card powered by REFULGENCE TECHNOSTREAM™, a comprehensive provider of Employment verification services in India. Refulgence’s seeks to provide innovative and cost effective solutions to help clients achieve high business propensity. Employment verification services is our only core business.

Our professional employment verification practices reduce the risk associated with hiring decisions. With carrying out of our employee verification checks, we give the insight you need to find out the unknown specifics, rapidly and simply. We offer a range of employment verification services to organizations of all shapes and sizes.
